Title: This is number 10,000
Description:
Give or take.
It’s hard to get the exact count through the sands of time.
But it’s at least 10,000 blog posts as of today.
That’s 25 years, once or twice a day.
Back of the envelope, that’s about 2 billion blog post views.
I’ve written and edited every post m…

Title: New update brings Gemini Live capabilities to Samsung Galaxy S25 users
Description: Samsung announces real-time visual AI will be rolled out to all Galaxy S25 users for free.

Title: CalDigit Launches New Thunderbolt 5 Docks
Description:

Both docks support transfer speeds of up to 80Gb/s with a speed boost feature when paired with Apple's Thunderbolt 5 Macs.

Title: Zelle App Shuts Down. Here's How to Still Digitally Send Money for Free
Description: Zelle killed off its free mobile app, but many banks still support its digital money transfers.

Title: Bienvenidos! Some colleges are targeting a long-neglected group: Hispanic students
Description: Colleges are recognizing the importance of this growing pool of potential students.

Title: Canada has billions in US real estate. Trump's threats put that at risk.
Description:
Canadian investors have been the biggest foreign buyers of US commercial real estate.
Trade barriers and insults from the White House imperil that.

Title: Rock & Roll Hall of Famer Clem Burke, Drummer of Blondie, Dies at 70
Description: Burke’s versatile drumming propelled the iconic rock group Blondie during its decades performing everything from new-wave punk to disco-infused tunes.

Title: Why My Mother Thought Alternative Medicine Could Cure Her Cancer
Description:
Doctors suggested surgery.
She turned to scorpion venom and coffee enemas.

Title: Budget airline Avelo to fly deportation flights for ICE from Arizona
Description: Budget carrier Avelo Airlines says it has signed an agreement to fly deportation flights from Arizona starting in May

Title: Hydrogen fuel cell trucks hit the roads in Georgia
Description:
Hydrogen trucks debut in Georgia, sparking debates on costs and green freight gains.
Kurt “CyberGuy" Knutsson comments on this promising chapter in green logistics evolution.

Title: The Modern Struggle Is Fighting Weaponized Addiction (2020)

Title: How Trump's second term just made digital sovereignty a European priority
Description:
With Trump’s return and the CLOUD Act, U.S.
access to European data is a growing risk.
Discover why open-source solutions and a solid cloud infrastructure are the only way forward to digital sovereignty.

Title: Vaccines Save Lives. That’s Why We Need Global Immunization
Description:

Title: People Likely Aren’t as Susceptible to False Memories as Researchers Thought
Description: New studies underscore the difficulty of implanting entirely fictional events in a person’s recollection
